title: iniyEdu kavalai
sahitya:
iniyEdu kavalai ennaiyyan murugEshan iru kAlum piDitta enakku


anupallavi

  kaniyonru peravE gaganam valam vanda kaniyenraran magizh gAngEyanirukka


caraNam    varuginra innal vaDivEl kaNDODum perum inbamellAm peridAgak-kUDum 
karu mEgham kaNDu kaLittAdumayilAm pariyEru maNNal padam cenni vaitta enakk-
